    • io.github.yappy.lua.LuaEngine

extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • LuaEngine

        public LuaEngine()
        Initialize LuaEngine with DEFAULT_MEMORY_LIMIT and DEFAULT_INTR_INST_COUNT.

      • LuaEngine

        public LuaEngine(long nativeMemoryLimit,
                 int intrInstCount)
        Initialize LuaEngine. Lua allocates native memory for work with lua_Alloc callback. nativeMemoryLimit can limit it. This engine sets debug hook for interrupt check. intrInstCount is its frequency. (instruction count)
        Parameters:
        nativeMemoryLimit - Native heap size which Lua can use.
        intrInstCount - Instruction count for debug hook.

    • Method Detail

      • close

        public void close()
        Destroy LuaEngine. All native resources will be destroyed.
        Specified by:
        close in interface java.lang.AutoCloseable

      • getLibraryVersion

        public static java.lang.String getLibraryVersion()
        Get this library (jar) version. It will be git tag and hash.
        Returns:
        Library version info.

      • getLuaVersion

        public LuaVersion getLuaVersion()
        Get Lua version info.
        Returns:
        Lua version info.

      • openStdLibs

        public void openStdLibs()
                 throws LuaException
        Open Lua default standard libraries. Library set is LuaStdLib.DEFAULT_SET.
        Throws:
        LuaException - A Lua error occurred.

      • openStdLibs

        public void openStdLibs(java.util.Set<LuaStdLib> libs)
                 throws LuaException
        Open Lua standard libraries. The parameter should be EnumSet of LuaStdLib
        Parameters:
        libs - Set of LuaStdLib.
        Throws:
        LuaException - A Lua error occurred.

      • setPrintFunction

        public void setPrintFunction(LuaPrint print)
        Set Lua standard print() function callback. Lua print() func is replaced automatically by this engine.
        Parameters:
        print - Print callback.

                           java.lang.String name,

                    throws LuaException

        Parameters:
        table - Global table variable name.
        name - Table key.
        value - Value.
        Throws:
        LuaException - Lua error.

      • openLibrary

        public void openLibrary(LuaLibrary lib)
                 throws LuaException
        Register a Lua library table and functions automatically. Library class and fields must be annotated with appropriate annotations. (see LuaLibrary)
        Parameters:
        lib - LuaLibrary instance.
        Throws:
        LuaException - Lua error.
        See Also:
